channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hackers are trying to steal passwords and sensitive data from users of Signal clone
item.description: The bug in the modified messaging app can expose users' “plaintext usernames, passwords, and other sensitive data,” per GreyNoise.

item.title: 9 Best MagSafe Wallets, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: These convenient and slim magnetic wallets are the ones you’ll want to stick to the back of your smartphone.

item.title: Shark Steam Pickup 3-in-1 Hard Floor Cleaner Review: A Do-It-All Cleaning Gadget
item.description: Want a do-it-all hard floor cleaner? Give this gadget a try.

item.title: Confident Security, ‘the Signal for AI,’ comes out of stealth with $4.2M

item.title: Hackers Are Finding New Ways to Hide Malware in DNS Records

item.title: Zuckerberg and Meta investors reach settlement in $8B privacy case

item.title: Boulevard raises $80M to power self-care boom driven by Botox and GLP-1 surge
item.description: The nine-year-old salon and spa software provider has hit a valuation of nearly $800 million.

item.title: 3 Best Hall Effect Keyboards for Gamers and Serious Typists (2025)
